name: Bridenapping
description:
René and Marcel are two retired secret agents. In love of their careers, they decided to come back...

Ever wanted to interrupt a wedding and say "I AM OPPOSED TO THIS MARRIAGE" ? They do that ! And this is their daily routine ! 

Enter this game, Come to a wedding, kick some asses and kidnapp the bride...  ONLY FOR FUN !

This game is available for controllers and 2 players co-op only.

(Also available with keyboard but less optimize: 

Move: P1 = Q/D and P2 = Left/Right

Jump/Throw varticaly the bride: P1 = Z and P2 = up

Shoot/Throw horizontaly the bride: P1 = S and P2 = down

But we dare you to play with controllers :p)
